name: Restriction on manufacture or distribution
text: [§332D-2]  Restriction on manufacture or distribution.  On or after January 1, 2006, a person may not manufacture, process, or distribute in commerce a product, or a flame‑retarded part of a product, containing more than one‑tenth of one per cent, by mass, of pentaBDE, octaBDE, or any other chemical formulation that is part of these classifications. [L 2004, c 146, pt of §2]
